episode.title: Out on Home Video
episode.rawTitle: 237: ‘Out on Home Video’ With Matthew Panzarino
episode.author: Daring Fireball / John Gruber
episode.description: Matthew Panzarino returns to the show. Topics include recent blockbuster movies, motion smoothing on TVs, iPhone demand rumors, Apple’s Made For iPhone (MFi) program, and more. Recorded live from The Overlook Hotel in Sidewinder, Colorado.
episode.showNotes:
Matthew Panzarino returns to the show. Topics include recent blockbuster movies, motion smoothing on TVs, iPhone demand rumors, Apple’s Made For iPhone (MFi) program, and more. Recorded live from The Overlook Hotel in Sidewinder, Colorado.

Sponsored by:

  • Linode: Instantly deploy and manage an SSD server in the Linode Cloud. Get $20 in credit with promo code talkshow2018.
  • Tres Pontas: Single-family-estate coffee, freshly roasted and delivered right to your door. Save 10 percent off a subscription with code thetalkshow.
  • Jamf Now: Set up and protect your Apple devices at work. First 3 devices are free.

Links:

  • Tom Cruise and Christopher McQuarrie’s PSA on the evils of motion smoothing.
  • Walt Hickey: “Tom Hanks and Steven Spielberg Might Be the Best Collaboration in Hollywood”.
  • Comcast Xfinity mobile service.
  • My review of Apple’s $39 iPhone XR clear case.
  • Guilherme Rambo finds clues suggesting new Smart Battery Cases from Apple.

This episode of The Talk Show was edited by Caleb Sexton.
